title: Create a modern, responsive CMS Admin Dashboard
content:
Create a modern, responsive CMS Admin Dashboard for a blogging platform that is fully compatible with static hosting like Netlify. The dashboard should look professional, clean, and user-friendly with the following pro features:

üîë Authentication & User Management

Secure login/logout system.

User roles: Admin, Editor, Author, Viewer.

Profile settings with avatar upload and dark/light theme toggle.

üìù Content Management

Quick post creation button (‚ÄúNew Post‚Äù).

Rich text + Markdown editor with image/video embed.

Categories and tags management.

Post status: Draft, Scheduled, Published.

Auto-save drafts and post version history (rollback option).

üìä Dashboard Overview (Main Screen)

Total Posts, Drafts, Published Posts count.

Graph/Chart of posts published by month.

Latest posts preview with edit/delete buttons.

Recent comments (via API like Disqus or Firebase).

Notifications (new comments, scheduled post reminder).

üìÇ Media Library

Upload images, videos, docs.

Drag & drop file upload.

Search + filter media files.

‚öôÔ∏è SEO & Google Optimization Tools

Dedicated SEO panel per post with fields:

Meta title & description.

OpenGraph (Facebook/Twitter preview).

Keywords field with density analyzer.

Sitemap auto-generator.

Google Analytics integration (show traffic graph on dashboard).

Search Console integration (track clicks, impressions, top queries).

Schema Markup generator (FAQ, Breadcrumbs, Article schema).

üé® Customization & Themes

Theme selector for frontend blog.

Option to edit blog layout, header, footer, and colors.

üìà Extra Pro Features

Content calendar (schedule posts visually).

AI content suggestions (title ideas, SEO keywords).

Multi-language content support.

Backup & Restore posts.

Security logs (failed login attempts, changes history).

The dashboard design should be clean like Google Analytics + Notion + WordPress combined. It must be responsive, mobile-friendly, with smooth navigation sidebar (Posts, Media, SEO, Settings, Users).

Goal: A professional CMS Admin Dashboard at /admin/dashboard with advanced blogging, SEO, and analytics features, optimized for Google ranking.
